plot: A filmed record of a bizarre garden party organized to pay a fine incurred by singer Ula for "liberating a chandelier from Harrods."
title: Ula's Fete
plot_es: A filmed record of a bizarre garden party organized to pay a fine incurred by singer Ula for "liberating a chandelier from Harrods."
plot_en: A filmed record of a bizarre garden party organized to pay a fine incurred by singer Ula for "liberating a chandelier from Harrods."
